title: Harvest Money: Farming indigenous chicken for profit

tasks.task: Conducting a poultry farm tour and sharing best practices for raising local chicken breeds.
subtasks: Entering and exiting the chicken farm for biosecurity.
Observing and discussing the feeding process for local chicken breeds.
Managing young chicks and addressing common challenges.
Discussing the high cost and care required for local breeds compared to other chicken types.
Exploring disease prevention and management on the farm.
